about.title: About Me
about.description: I am dedicated, communicative, creative, and committed to the tasks assigned to me. Passionate about technology since childhood, my curiosity led me to learn on my own. Creative and innovative, I breathe new ideas and business challenges.
details: Frontend specialist with experience in micro frontend architecture.
Development background in a digital agency, creating many websites for large companies in my region.
An eternal student of 'human behavior,' I create applications always thinking about the end user, with the mission of making systems intuitive.
I really want to live in Portugal and I am preparing for this mission.
Father of two beautiful girls, Luna and Leona, and married to Maria Gabriela. All my dedication is to make them proud and ensure their safety.
Aikido and Iaido practitioner, I apply the principles of Bushido in the work environment, such as commitment, fidelity, loyalty, and honor.

items.name: Frontend Project with React
items.description: A modern and responsive application developed with React and integration with RESTful APIs.

items.name: Design System laUrsa
items.description: A scalable design system to standardize components and improve visual consistency in digital products.

items.name: Analytical Dashboard with Angular
items.description: A data analysis tool with interactive visualizations and modular architecture.
